name: Midas
description:
Midas was the fabled king who was granted the ability to turn whatever he touched to gold. Become Midas and haunt his distant kingdom. Use the Leap Motion controller to reach into his world and turn his universe into the timeless yellow metal. Step into the ox blood tainted water to escape this iteration of his life.

Controls:

Mouse to look around

ASDW to move

Space to jump

Alt to crouch

Leap Motion to touch
